thread.section_title: OneSimCard Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of OneSimCard | www.onesimcard.com | 2 of 17
thread.title: Jason

author: Jason
title: Jason
text: I've used OneSimCard for probably over 3 years now. I've been able to connect in Japan, China, Taiwan, Mexico, Argentina, and the the US. Sometimes it takes a bit of time to find a carrier but I've always been able to call and send texts. I don't use data so I can't speak about that, but now that I have a dual sim card phone I always have my onesimcard with autoreload so whenever I travel I don't have to bother about phones because it's all ready for me, so no complaints from me.
